skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.

skillTree.localised_description: There are some deals that it would be extremely unwise to renege onâ€¦
Beautiful and innocent it may be, but all will be consumed by fire in the end. It is written.

effects.description:
Attrition: +15% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

Enemy leadership: -6 when enemy lays siege or encircles
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: There's nothing quite like a good, straightforward plan - and this is nothing like one! Complexity rarely trumps simplicity, in all matters.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: There is always much one can learn about the art of death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Eustache was thrown away from Gisoreux as an offering to a foreign power, simply for defending the lands to which he was pledged. He had been betrayed by the very duke who had taught him what honour and duty were. Eustache is no longer a knight, no longer bound by the Knightly Code, and no longer has a duty to the crown. His only duty is to himself.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against Bretonnia

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Bretonnia

skillTree.localised_description: Eustache was marked out from a young age as an exceptional warrior. Among other heroics, Eustache took the head of an Orc chieftain and was much renowned in Gisoreux as a relentless knight and a true master swordsman whose skills confounded even the most experienced of Gisoreuxâ€™ weapon tutors.

Once Eustache had fled from his Imperial captures, he quickly realised that the knights he had once called brothers would no longer give him aid, fearful of dishonour in the eyes of the duke. Thus Eustache had to fled to the most forsaken, least honourable place in Bretonnia - the home he had barely known, Mousillon.

Eustache is now Mallobaudeâ€™s pet killer, despatched to assassinate enemies Mallobaude does not wish to deal with personally. Eustacheâ€™s prowess with the sword is almost unmatched, but he has grown to employ other methods, from stabbing victims in their bed to burning down their houses.
This one doesn't just move in the shadows, they *are* the shadowsâ€¦

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each enemy entity in range

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.

items.colour_text: Eustache's blade is named after his nickname, the Rusting Blade, a nickname he himself coined after being scolded by a fencing tutor as a boy for not looking after his blade properly.

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -5%
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Eustache of the Rusting Blade is one of the most skilled swordsmen in Mousillon, and it is said he is second only to Mallobaude himself in the skills of the battlefield.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
